long_description: Take it camping, fishing or to the kid's game-the lightweight GCI Quik-E-Seat chair offers comfort and easy portability. Adjustable, patented Auto-Fold carrying strap closes this lightweight chair automatically. Fully padded backrest and seat offer comfort and support. Beverage holder keeps your favorite drink within reach. Strong, lightweight powder-coated steel frame and water-resistant 600-denier polyester fabric withstand regular use.
short_description: Take it camping, fishing or to the kid's game-the lightweight GCI Quik-E-Seat chair offers comfort and easy portability.
